description: The built-in Videos app on GNOME errored on startup, and VLC showed a black screen when playing .webp files. Showcase works perfectly!
summary: Works better than Videos and VLC

description:
Even though this is in beta still, it's absolutely amazing.

I've been trying to find a good libadwatia video player for a long time, and this is the best out of all of them. 

That being said, it needs some options, such as looping a video, video playlists (with shuffle), and reopening the previously open video/playlist. I think that the welcome/start screen might need some visual work.
